title: In the Country of Women
description:
Acclaimed Southern California novelist Susan Straight shares the complex, multi-racial chapters of her own family history and the generations of women at the heart of the story.

Learn more about Susan's books, including In the Country of Women

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
